ARABIC: لَقَدْ جِئْنَٰكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَكُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We brought you the truth but most of you hated the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have brought to you the truth, but most of you despise the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We brought you the Truth; but to the truth most of you were averse.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We brought you the truth but most of you disliked it".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We have brought the Truth to you, but most of you detest the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Indeed We have brought the truth to you, but most of you have a hatred for the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Certainly We have brought you the truth, but most of you are averse to the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We brought you the truth, but most of you were averse to the truth.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We verily brought the Truth unto you, but ye were, most of you, averse to the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have certainly brought the truth to you: but most of you have an aversion for the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly We brought the truth Unto you, but most Of you are to the truth averse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘We certainly brought you the truth, but most of you were averse to the truth.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily We have brought the Truth to you: but most of you have a hatred for Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Indeed We have brought the truth (Muhammad SAW with the Quran), to you, but most of you have a hatred for the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We brought you the truth, but most of you were averse to the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have given you the truth, but most of you hate the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:78] God, exalted be He, says: ‘Verily We brought you, O people of Mecca, the truth, by the tongue of the Messenger, but most of you were averse to the truth’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We verily brought the Truth unto you) He says: Gabriel came to your Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) with the Qur'an, (but ye were, most of you) all of you, (averse to the Truth) deniers of Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an.
